about_the_game:
Experience a Glimpse into 'GemCore'

Plunge into the depths of corporate darkness in 'GemCore', where a neon-drenched universe belies a sinister tale of unbridled capitalism. Trapped in the role of an unwitting engineer, you're a cog in the vast machinery of a merciless mining corporation.

Warning: This demo is an active, living project with regular weekly updates. Dive in and explore a slice of our evolving universe!

The Demo Experience

The demo offers a curated selection of plugins and a quick play mode, enabling you to dive into procedurally generated worlds and experience the core gameplay firsthand. While the demo provides a foundational taste of GemCore, the full game will deliver a more refined experience and introduce an exciting Arcade Mode for endless challenges.

Early Feedback Opportunity: Join our community by providing feedback that will shape future updates and the full game experience.

name: GemCore Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics

short_description: Slay hordes of creatures while you mine millions of gems trying to get to the center of procedurally generated planets and blow them up, earning cash to make the season's milestones! GemCore is a bullet heaven rogue-lite with deep strategic card game mechanics.
